page.title: 14Trade-Crowthorne High Street
page.content: Crowthorne High Street contains a mixture of shop and office buildings, private dwellings, two public houses, two garages, a veterinary surgery, and a Fire Station. The{oldest traders}are a{shoe shop (1895),}once a boot and saddlers, and a{public house (1871).} The{most recent business}is that of an {estate agent}opened{1985. } To-day all businesses report that {trade is increasing.}Approximately 50% of those employed live in Crowthorne, the largest number being employed by a supermarket.{50% of the businesses use {a computer}and{30% take young people {on Youth Training Schemes.}Some feel there is a need for more shops and car parking places. Permission has been granted for a three storey block of flats, offices and shops with an additional 42 car parking places to be built this year.
